description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Fight against time in this old school arcade racing game. Race in 14 circuits in 9 diferent scenarios with four cars with different characteristics. High speed at 60 frames per second.
